shortdesc.ph: The face shape beauty style options.

p.props: cpp ios mac unreal bp unity flutter electron rn cs

pd.p:
The face shape beauty style:
(0): (Default) Female.
(1): Male.

plentry.pd: The intensity of the face shape beauty style, with a value range oof [0.0,0.1]. The default value is 0.0, which means no face shape beauty effect. The higher the value, the more obvious the face shape beauty effect.
